query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS alertSettings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  lowStockThreshold INT DEFAULT 10 NOT NULL,
  criticalStockThreshold INT DEFAULT 5 NOT NULL,
  defaultReorderQuantity INT DEFAULT 50 NOT NULL,
  emailNotificationsEnabled INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2CUNeJnYnTRxHkL.275a04e24557 --database RJnuvqs68igmigugNEp5S4 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS alertSettings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  lowStockThreshold INT DEFAULT 10 NOT NULL,
  criticalStockThreshold INT DEFAULT 5 NOT NULL,
  defaultReorderQuantity INT DEFAULT 50 NOT NULL,
  emailNotificationsEnabled INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
